title: 5g connection issue in Pixel 5
content:
Hi,

I am in UAE and got the new google pixel 5 from UK. the problem i am facing is the phone connects only in 4g LTE. replaced with a new SIM yesterday and still the same issue. got the service provider connected and checked  from there all network settings and all seems to be fine. to double sure swapped sim with another brand 5g supported fone and everything seems to be fine. any solutions ? have done already all the system updates. please help
